author: JohanRivera
post_text: May 2, 2020 at 11:45 PM#1HelloI am trying to create a macro that creates a new macro with 3 different editable lines with pop-up questionsCan anybody help me?

posts.author: JohanRivera
posts.post_text: May 2, 2020 at 11:45 PM#1HelloI am trying to create a macro that creates a new macro with 3 different editable lines with pop-up questionsCan anybody help me?

posts.author: F Dijkers
posts.post_text: May 3, 2020 at 1:22 PM#2Hi,You'll need to create the macro first. Then, you need to store 3 different lines. After that you'll need to assign the 3 created lines by input. The macro would look something like this:Line 1CodeStore Macro xLine 2CodeStore Macro 1.x.1 thru 1.x.3Line 3CodeAssign Macro 1.x.1 /cmd=()Line 4CodeAssign Macro 1.x.2 /cmd=()Line 5CodeAssign Macro 1.x.3 /cmd=()Sincerely,Floris DijkersLighting Director & Designerflorisdijkers.comlighting@florisdijkers.com

title: Macro create macro different lines
